text: Dover Street Market is a multi-brand retailer originally located on Dover Street, in Mayfair, London. It has stores in New York City, Tokyo, Singapore, Paris, Beijing and Los Angeles. Dover Street Market was created by Rei Kawakubo of Japanese fashion label Comme des Gar√ßons and her husband Adrian Joffe. ==References== Category:Retail companies of the United Kingdom
title: Dover Street Market
